response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to both of us. This product is not just an item; it's a testament to excellence and craftsmanship. Given its significance and rarity, I understand that its worth is recognized by you at $800,000. To ensure that we both achieve our goals, I propose to sell this product to you at a special introductory price of $750,000. This offer is exclusive to you and reflects my confidence in the mutual benefits this transaction would bring. Please let me know if you wish to proceed with this offer within the next 24 hours. I look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 750000}
